channel.title: Home Decor on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Oscar-Winning Set Designer Catherine Martin Drops Spooky-Chic Halloween Line at Anthropologie
item.description: Known for her captivating costume and production design for films like ‘Moulin Rogue!’ and ‘The Great Gatsby,’ Martin’s limited-edition AnthroHome capsule is equal parts moody and playful.

item.description: Known for her captivating costume and production design for films like ‘Moulin Rogue!’ and ‘The Great Gatsby,’ Martin’s limited-edition AnthroHome capsule is equal parts moody and playful.

item.title: From Le Creuset to Parachute, 27 Last-Chance Home Deals From Nordstrom’s Anniversary Sale
item.description: After browsing the full catalog of discounted finds, here are the bedding, bath, decor and kitchen standouts from the department store’s annual savings event.

item.title: The Furniture on Kelly Clarkson’s Vegas Residency Stage Is Now Available to Shop at Wayfair
item.description: On the heels of her opening night at The Colosseum, the singer and Wayfair drop the Kelly Clarkson Home Studio Collection, inviting fans to bring a piece of her stage to their space.
